# Changelog

## v0.0.8
- Remove requirement for pymatgen>2022.

## v0.0.7
- Simple CLI tool for relaxing crystals.

## v0.0.6

- Less noisy Relaxer by default.

## v0.0.4

- Fix model download
- More documentation
- Bug fixes

## v0.0.2

- Fix edge cases for triple bonds
- Enable model weights download within code

## v0.0.1

- Initial release.
